Source: transpose.js

const stof = require('./stof')
const mtof = require('./mtof')

/**
 * Transpose for Tone.Player's playback rate
 * @param {*} value string: note name and octave || number: midi note number
 * @param {*} base string: note name and octave || number: midi note number
 * @returns {number} fraction to use for Tone.Player's playbackRate parameter
 */

  var transposeForPlayer = function(value, base){
    if(typeof value == 'string') {
        value = stof(value)
    } else if (typeof value == 'number') {
        value = mtof(value)
    }

    if(typeof base == 'string') {
        base = stof(base)
    } else if (typeof base == 'number') {
        base = mtof(base)
    }

    

    return value / base;

  }

  module.exports = transposeForPlayer;
